frameworks: Node.js built-in http server (no web framework)
dependencies: Node.js runtime only; no npm dependencies declared (package.json has no dependencies/devDependencies) — package.json
Uses Node core module: http — index.js
architectural_resources: Web application/API: simple HTTP server on port 3000 — index.js
Container image build and runtime (Docker) — Dockerfile
Kubernetes Deployment (3 replicas) running container image from ECR — Kubernetes/2 deployment.yaml
Kubernetes Service type LoadBalancer exposing port 80 -> 3000 (implies cloud load balancer) — Kubernetes/3 service.yaml
AWS ECR repository (my-ecr-repo) in account 355001659877, region us-east-1 — .github/workflows/ci.yml
AWS EKS cluster nawy-eks-cluster (kubectl apply via update-kubeconfig) — .github/workflows/ci.yml
GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline (lint, terraform init/plan/apply, docker build/push, deploy to EKS) — .github/workflows/ci.yml

Terraform is referenced for provisioning, but no .tf files are present in Terraform/ (only init/validate logs), so actual IaC resources cannot be enumerated from this repo snapshot — Terraform/ directory contents
